mapper.insert: insert into course (cource_id, cource_name, cource_time, cource_location, teacher_id, `class`, cource_account) values (#{courceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{courceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{courceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{courceAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update course set cource_name = #{courceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cource_time = #{courceTime,jdbcType=DATE}, cource_location = #{courceLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teacher_id = #{teacherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `class` = #{class,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cource_account = #{courceAccount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where cource_id = #{courceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select cource_id, cource_name, cource_time, cource_location, teacher_id, `class`, cource_account from course where cource_id = #{courceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select cource_id, cource_name, cource_time, cource_location, teacher_id, `class`, cource_account from course
